445790.name: DUAL GEAR Demo
445790.description:
Dual Gear Pre-Alpha for Steam Version

Come and Support us on INDIEGOGO!



Dual Gear is a turn based strategy game combination with action gameplay inspired from classical japanese mech TBS games . Player can command the units with turn based system from the third person action perspective ,develop a pilot, customize their own mechs squad to finish the mission and find the secret parts,weapons ,story. The game is powered by Unreal Engine 4 and still in development. Also the game need your help for funding on Indiegogo pls visit and backe us! The Final week is coming!
